p.draft-comment: these steps used in MapR Prereqs in Install chapter and Working with Upgraded MapR System in Upgrade chapter

ol.li:
Use the following command to set the $SDC_HOME environment variable to the location where you installed :export SDC_HOME=<installation directory>
For example:export SDC_HOME=/opt/streamsets-datacollectorThe default installation directory for an RPM installation is /opt/streamsets-datacollector. The tarball installation directory is the location where you extracted the file.

Use the following command to set the $SDC_CONF environment variable to the configuration directory:export SDC_CONF=<configuration directory>
For example, use the following command if you used the default configuration directory for an RPM installation:export SDC_CONF=/etc/sdc
Use the following command to set up MapR:$SDC_DIST/bin/streamsets setup-mapr
When prompted, enter the absolute path to the MapR home directory, usually /opt/mapr.

If the MapR cluster uses username/password login authentication, uncomment the following line in the environment configuration file: #export SDC_JAVA_OPTS="-Dmaprlogin.password.enabled=true"
If you start as a service, modify the $SDC_DIST/libexec/sdcd-env.sh file. If you start manually, modify the $SDC_DIST/libexec/sdc-env.sh file.
